I have eczema and I'm pretty sure if I use it too often, it'll end up making it flare up so I don't recommend this if you have eczema or asthma or are otherwise sensitive to scents.For now, I'm using homemade flaxseed gel and just layering a small amount of this over it.  I really wish MopTop would make an unscented version or just not dump an entire vat of fragrance into their otherwise wonderful product.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Ineffective and stinky üòû
Review: While I can see it's helping to define my curls a *bit* better than if I used no product at all, unfortunately it's done nothing to get rid of any of the frizz. I'm still experimenting with it, so we'll see. But I also had to knock some points off because the overwhelming stink of lemon pledge! Thankfully the smell goes away when it dries, but it doesn't seem like a good thing for it to smell like floor cleaner in the first place. Overall, I'm far from impressed. üëé

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Great gentle shampoo
Review: Very moisturizing formula. I love that it clarifies gently and isn't loaded with heavy proteins and butters which give me build up. I rotate washing with this and As I am cowash. This is the one I reach for if I want something a little more clarifying. It's a great curly girl friendly shampoo.*Update:Still my favorite shampoo. Since buying this I've tried Giovanni's 50/50 which didn't work as well.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Honestly this product was a major disappointment. I‚Äôve heard so many great things about it ...
Review: Honestly this product was a major disappointment. I‚Äôve heard so many great things about it made me buy it. The first time I used it on my wet hair I loved how it felt and things were good but from great to horrible didn‚Äôt take too long. Once my hair dried it was over. My curly wasn't defined in any way nor did it hold the shape. Then I nothing it was crunchy and hard and then the flakes happened. It was horrible to the point other people noticed it. By the way, this was just after one try and yes I followed the direction.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Disappointed
Review: first time I put this leave in conditioner my hair was wet and as it dried it was very for the I put more products on and it still is Frizzy but now it has a filmy feel to it I am not happy at all the outcome is nothing like the description

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: 2B Fine Wavy - Thumbs Up
Review: This Is my first CGM  product and I loved it. I have compared it to As I Am cowash and this one gives me better results.I use this as cowash or after I use moptop low poo cleanser. I‚Äôve seen my waves actually clump and not look flat. Smells great, not strong and lingering.Only con, not enough product. Finished bottle in a month (cowashed about 3xs a week)But will consider buying it again if no other product compares.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: FOR CURLY GIRLS, IT'S ALL ABOUT THE PRODUCT!
Review: With naturally curly hair, IT'S ALL ABOUT THE PRODUCT, and you CAN'T GO WRONG WITH MOPTOP!! I love everything I've used from them (& love 'em best whenever I've stuck with using THEIR haircare AND cocktailed their stylers.) Hands down this is my favorite product they make, and it's perfect when combined with their medium hold natural gel. Love, love, LOVE their performance ...and also their clean, citrusy, LOVELY SCENT! They even have GREAT HOW-TO VIDEOS on their website on hair care & styling ...done by CURLY GIRLS FOR CURLY GIRLS! üíú‚ù§üß°

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Fantastic product for adding "oomph" to natural curls and waves
Review: I love this product. I bought a tub of it back in September 2018 and I just finally ran out in May 2019. Coming on here to order more made me realize I should leave a review! A little bit of this goes a long way and you really don't need to use more than a nickel to quarter size amount depending on how much hair you have. Too much will actually cause you to end up with flakes so definitely start cautiously until you figure your perfect amount out. The photo I attached has the wash day before I received this product not using any curl activators on the left and then the wash adding this product into my line-up on the right. I think it's pretty obvious that it works!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: CRUNCH CITY
Review: I don‚Äôt know if I did something wrong or what but after reading all the great reviews I was super excited to try this. Firstly, it came with the seal half on half off. Secondly, it made my hair crunchier than any other product I have ever used, YUCK!!! I was so self consious of my hair all day I ended up putting it in a messy bun (on a wash day, ugh!). I will maybe try again and use less (even though I don‚Äôt feel like I used that much??) and update if it‚Äôs better next time but so far, bad impression :(

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Favorite conditioner ever!
Review: I love this conditioner. I have super thick coarse hair and I generally use a handful of conditioner.  Not with this though! I need about 2 quarters worth and it's plenty! The slip is amazing. It makes my hair detangle almost instantly. I love the smell too. It doesn't linger if you're worried about that.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I used this product alone and it worked fine. It does leave a crunchy cast which is ...
Review: I need to use this more to get more consistent results since I have never used it before  this purchase and this is a new purchase. I used this product alone and it worked fine. It does leave a crunchy cast which is good for wavy/curly girls to maintain a curl pattern. I scrunch it out later if I air dry or even after I diffuse. I have never used a hair custard before. A little goes a looong way which is good for the price. It feels like the slim I used to play with as a little girl, and the smell is nice and citrusy. It is up in the air if I will repurchase it and if so, it won't be for a long time because the tub is large.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Jury is still out...
Review: From other reviews, I knew it was not a heavy hold product. I did think it would be more of a "custard" texture as opposed to a thin gel texture. Just began using it, not sure if I will order again. I have short, thin, loose curly hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Perfect for 3a-c hair with Curly Girl method
Review: Been using this gel for a couple of years straight, in about a 3:1 ratio with leave-in conditioner, plus a few drops jojoba oil. Fantastic shine and texture, light, bouncy, low buildup. Scent is lovely. Hope they make this product forever. I can‚Äôt vouch for other curl types, but this is ideal for type 3!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Glad I Purchased This!
Review: I have low porosity, fine, 2c/3a hair. I had been using DevaCurl B'Leave In and Wavemaker but wanted something with more hold. Mop Top was it! I will say this,  try Mop Top alone before mixing with other products. I was putting MT over my B'Leave In and the results were good but not great. I used it alone and BAM! I had to die for curls. What works for me is to coat my hair, scrunch and plop for 30 minutes and then diffuse without touching my hair at high heat high speed until 80% dry, then go for the roots at medium heat/speed, then finish on the ends. WORTH THE WORK! I finally love my wavy/curly hair!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: THE BEST, and only styler
Review: After you get rid of the gel cast THIS IS THE ONLY PRODUCT I USE AS A STYLER!!!! ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!! IT LEAVES SOFT TAMED VOLUMINOUS CUDLS OR WAVES!!! I AM IN LOVE I LIVE IN A PLACE THAT HAS SOME HUMIDITY AND I HAVE LIVED IN EXTREME DRY AREAS... THIS IS ESSENTIAL IN MY HAIR ROUTINE!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Expensive and didn't do much..
Review: Such a disappointment. I didn't like the price first of all. I thought for this price. I would be able to condense my hair products. Nope. To no avail. Made my hair look greasy. My waves fell super loose. Texture was just awful. Back to my old routine of leave in conditioner and got2be gel. (Black or yellow bottle) this routine is cheaper too.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: SMELLY
Review: I usually use a combination of Ouidad gel and DevaCurl cream to get my curls looking their best. Amazon was sold out of my usual gel last time, so I ordered this instead. It does an okay job holding curls together (similar to other nice gels I've tried) and only causes a moderate amount of "crispiness" in areas where you apply too much. The thing that I can't stand about this gel is the horrible smell! It smells like chemicals to me. I even had my boyfriend comment on the weird smell when my hair was wet. Trying to make myself use at least half of the container, but can't wait to throw this stuff out.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Best conditioner I‚Äôve tried!
Review: I‚Äôve tried so many different hair products during the last year of embracing my natural waves, but I keep coming back to the Mop Top Daily Conditioner. I have fine, low-medium density, high porosity, 2C waves. The conditioner is light weight, but moisturizes like a heavy deep conditioner. And it has GREAT slip. My hair is incredibly tangly, and almost impossible to finger detangle when wet. This is the only conditioner I‚Äôve tried that allows me to finger detangle without feeling like I‚Äôm ripping my hair out. My hair loves this product!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Hair is void of moisture and feels like straw after using. Waste of money.
Review: I have fine curly hair, ringlets. I used this shampoo combined with the Moptop Leave in conditioner (which didn't condition) and then the Moptop Curly Custard, and my hair feels like straw, is ridiculously frizzy, and was harmed by these products. The curly custard is the only one that gave ANY moisture. The leave-in conditioner, was worse than the shampoo. Don't waste your money on these products, they hurt my hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Strong, defined hold
Review: I have fine permed hair and I've been struggling to find products that will enhance and hold my curls without weighing them down. A lot of products for curly hair are too heavy for me. Today was the first day I've used this curly hair custard and I am IMPRESSED. It creates a really strong cast, but once I scrunched out the crunch my curls were soft and defined unlike anything I've experienced before. Since this is the first time using it and I'm only about 2 hours into my day, I will hold off on official judgment until the end of the day, but so far this is my first holy grail product.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Nice formula, not great for fine hair
Review: I liked the formula and scent of this cowash, but unfortunately cowashing in general doesn't work with my fine, wavy/curly hair. My scalp is too greasy and all co-washes leave me with oily, weighed down curls. Instead I use Mop Tops gentle shampoo and am very happy with that...I use it every other day and it is not drying for either my scalp or my hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Good hold, tricky to use
Review: Pros: great hold, no allergy issues, easy to apply, plays well with other products, good ingredientsCons: tricky to use and can be drying and crunchy I‚Äôd not used exactly the right way. I brush products through my curls and this is such hardcore hold, that I had to finger curl my hair all over again after brushing because it was stick straight.Bottom line: Give it chance Apply on soaking wet hair. Apply adequate moisture underneath and plan on some crunchiness.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Excellent curl enhancer
Review: This custard is the best product I have found to enhance my 2C/3A curls.  It's not quite a defining gel,  but a product that will "encourage" waves into curls.The best way to use it is right after washing your hair, scrunching upwards.  The custard alone won't prevent frizz.  You still need to use gel.  I see some reviews that complain about a white residue, if you get that,  you're applying too much custard.I love the citrusy scent and how shiny my hair looks when it dries.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Very Good Product
Review: I've used this product for awhile, but stopped because I found something that worked better for my hair. However, I cut my hair very short and dyed it bright blue, and switched back to this because my other shampoo was stripping the color from my hair. This does not take out the color, and leaves my hair very soft.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: My Curls Are Back!
Review: This product is amazing. My hair had lost some of its shine and curl. I use this product daily along with the Curl Custard and my hair is soft, shiny and, best of all, my curls are defined and beautiful. My hair has been very easy to style and I'm getting a lot of compliments on it lately. I also love the scent. I just apply the product to wet hair, massage in and then rinse after I've finished washing my face and body. This product is great for any person with curly hair! Highly recommend!!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Wish for a return
Review: So think of hold gel and hair spray. That's what my hair felt like. Had no bounce. Also, to make matters worse my hair had millions of little white fuzz in it from this product. As if you took hair spray and let it sit in your hair and it just looked so bad.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: This is NOT for fine curls
Review: Based on everything I've heard, this is a great gel for most curly hair types. However it is NOT great for fine curls. I've been looking everywhere for a good gel for fine curls, and this did say that it was in the description, but it isn't. It left my hair sticky and stringy and with frizz and fly-aways for days. Also, no matter how little I used, there was no scrunching out the crunch. It just stayed crunchy even after diffusing. I'm sure it works well for other hair types, but not fine hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Soft, clumpy curls
Review: Following the Curly Girl method, this makes my curls look soft and in big clumps with the perfect amount of hold. My curly hair is the result of strong medication for an autoimmune disease but has been naturally board straight my whole life. I turned my naturally curly sister on to this after watching YouTube videos and now she loves it as much as I do.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Perfect balance of cleansing and conditioning
Review: I love the MopTop products.  I have struggled for a long time with my curly hair trying to keep it from just looking frizzy. I use the co-wash daily. It is the perfect balance of cleansing and conditioning. I only need to use the shampoo typically once a week. Also, a little goes a long way. I squeeze about the size of a quarter in the palm of my hand. My hair is considered long as it goes past my shoulders. FYI, I have received no products for my review. If you want to try the products head to the company website and you can order sample packets. They offer free shipping for the samples. If you like the products and have a prime account with Amazon it is cheaper to buy with Amazon.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Curly girl friendly wash day shampoo!
Review: MopTop creates high-quality products at amazing prices in a market that is saturated with insanely priced curly girl products. I LOVE this shampoo because it is CG-friendly but I still feel CLEAN because it does have a small lather to it (some die-hards claim true CG friendly shampoos have ZERO lather, I'm not a fan of those -- makes me feel like I haven't washed my scalp) and the scent is wonderful. Will continue to use on my wash days when I don't clarify!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: It works
Review: It makes your hair look amazing. No frizz! I used this product before heading out in 90 degree, sticky humidity, and no frizz! Less is more. Do not overdo this stuff. There is a slight loss of body with the no frizz thing, so you will probably have to dry with a diffuser. Hair looked amazing though!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Perfect for anyone using curly girl method!
Review: I have 3a/2c hair combination, and I follow the curly girl method - so I only use products without silicones and sulfates, and I don't use shampoo, at all, ever. This product is similar to kinky curly custard, and Camille Rose curl maker, but I find this one to be a little easier to apply & has a pleasant scent (citrus, yum!). My only complaint is that the amount is 8oz, and I wish I could find it in a 12 or 16 oz container bc I must use a lotttttttt of it. I use a hard hold over it bc it doesn't give me a ton of hold, but I always have to use a gel on top of any styler. Gel alone doesn't give me the definition I desire. THIS does!!! Highly recommend!!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Love this stuff!
Review: I have 2b/c curly hair that is pretty damaged from bleaching. I‚Äôve been following the curly girl method trying to nurse my curls back. This is, so far, the best gel I have used. I‚Äôve tried a number of gels and custards, and I‚Äôm pretty sure this one is my holy grail.I don‚Äôt find it flakey or sticky. It has good hold and I get a nice cast, that easily scrunches out. It smells nice and citrusy but it doesn‚Äôt linger. An excellent product that I will continue to purchase.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: OMG this custard is so awesome!!!!
Review: It smells soooooooo good and works just as good. I don't like gunking up my hair with a bunch of products. I just put leave-in conditioner and put this custard in my curly locks and I am in business. Keeps hair moisturized and curls defined. Sometimes I use this without the leave-in conditioner and it holds fine. It does create a cast around that strands, so once hair is dry, just gently scrunch your hair to take out the cast. It holds the curls.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Damaged Product
Review: Product came with a damaged lid, which I didn‚Äôt notice until I went to use it and I‚Äôm 2 days past the return window. Since it was open, the product had partially solidified and I can‚Äôt use it. Totally amazon‚Äôs fault. Love the product, but check it when it arrives.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Good for fine hair and sensitive scalps
Review: I have a sensitive scalp , the hunt has been on for a few years now trying to find a conditioner that won't give me dandruff or make my scalp break out or leave my hair greasy and weighed down . This stuff fits the bill . I've been using this brand for a few months now my hair and scalp likes it .  I wish it had the same scent as the shampoo but it doesn't smell bad .

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Holy Grail!
Review: OMG, I love this stuff!  It has made such a wonderful change in my hair.  I have very dry, 3a-3b curly hair that tends to frizz.  This custard helps my hair retain its curl and look moisturized and healthy.  Even helps on second day hair when I wet my hair to bring back the spring to curls crushed from sleep.  A little goes a long way, so don't apply too much.  The only downside--to me--is its uncanny resemblance (both in looks and texture) to snot!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Want to look like you have serious dandruff?! This is for you!
Review: I purchase this a few months ago and should have returned it as soon as I used it. I followed instructions to the T and my hair always ends up crusty with flakes. It‚Äôs awful.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: It Flakes!!!
Review: I received the product with the lid broken half way which must have happened during shipping. Amazon needs to do better with the way they ship their items. Aside from that the product so far is good, it provides real good hold and smells good. The only con is that if you use too much you will see flakes all around your hair. It is best used on soaking wet hair so it will glide smoothly. I‚Äôm hoping it will work great during the summer months.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: My Hair LOVES This
Review: I wasn't sure about this product but I'm thrilled to say it performed better than I expected on my hair. I can't speak for anyone else's hair, but my hair loves this product! I've topped it with Biosilk Rock Hard Styling Gelee for humidity protection and longevity. These products work fantastic together. Another pro for me is that my hair comes out curlier 5han usual when I use this. I am more than happy with my Mop Top Curly Hair Custard and I will be repurchasing.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Smells great!
Review: Less is definitely more with those leave in. Smells great but don‚Äôt use too much or you‚Äôll end up with a greasy mess!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Product not sealed - leaked during shipping
Review: I got a sample of this a while back and recently finally used it.  I like this product for my curly frizz-prone hair.  I find that I get the best results mixing it with some DevaCurl, otherwise it can get pretty crispy by the time I add enough to cover my hair.  I ordered this when my sample ran out, and was excited that it arrived today.  Unfortunately, it had oozed out of the jar despite being wrapped in bubble wrap because there was no seal on the inside of the product.  It makes me concerned about the product integrity.  Not sure if I'll order again based on that, and that bums me out.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Not sure its for me
Review: Left curls less defined than my normal routine. Got more frizz than normal. Was very soft and I did get a small cast so I tried more product and that helped. I just don't think it has the hold I need. Scent is very overpowering and I smell it all day and it's very distracting. Also this sucked up a lot of water when styling so I had to rewet my hair several times more than normal.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Love it!
Review: Great product. Hair feels more hydrated. I‚Äôm scent sensitive but this has a delightful scent and doesn‚Äôt bother me.  I highly recommend

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Better than some
Review: I'm torn about this. I absolutely love the smell, but it doesn't work as well as some other gels. It still does a pretty solid job for my 2B/2C mix hair. My biggest issue is that if I put a little it doesn't hold and if I put more in it flakes off to where I can see small dust-like parts coming of my hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: More Help for Chemo Curls
Review: After acquiring chemo curls, I have been at a loss as to how to deal with the frizz and general unruliness of my hair.  I had never used leave-in conditioner because my fine thin hair was easily weighed down.  This product dries and leaves my hair soft looking without that "wet hair" appearance some products give you.  I have already reordered!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: What a great hair gel
Review: Ok, this has to be one of best hair gels I have ever used to this day. This is great for wavy to curly hair. I put this on my hair while it‚Äôs very wet and don‚Äôt touch it until my hair is completely dry. For me that can be up to 2 hours. This does form a cast, which I scrunch out. Perfect  define curls  with great shine! No white flakes. This gel and Deva Ultra defining gel are amazing products! Worth the money! I will continue to purchase this product!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Holy grail
Review: I never leave reviews but this has been a game changing product for me (and I‚Äôve tried a LOT). I have fine, high porosity hair with a 3a curl pattern that is VERY frizz prone and loves protein. I use just this product mixed with neutral protein filler drops and my results have been amazing- no other gels or leave ins needed. You only use a small amount so it‚Äôs great value too. Can‚Äôt recommend highly enough.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: The clumping is bananas!
Review: I‚Äôm only a couple months into trying curly girl again. The last time I tried I was using things waaaaaaaaay too heavy for my 2b fine hair and the experiment didn‚Äôt last long. It‚Äôs definitely a journey!I looooooove this custard! The clumping I‚Äôm getting after the first use is bananas! I‚Äôm a little worried that my 2nd day hair will be too weighed down, so next time I might try without a leave in or oils and just use this custard with a gel for more hold. Interested to try more mop top items now.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Not a cost effective purchase
Review: The jar was very small I was expecting something bigger for the price, it also came open and spilled over my other items. For the price you'd think they would secure the lid a little better.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Too light for daily conditioning but perfect for co-wash
Review: I have a little more than medium porosity curls and this was too light after a shampoo but I didn‚Äôt want to waste it so I tried it as just a co-wash and LOVE it for that purpose. Now I‚Äôm co-washing with it most wash days but I still need to use about twice as much as normal so the bottle is not lasting long.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I‚Äôll pass on this one again.
Review: This product worked great initially, but by the end of day one it had flaked just like a gel would. Very disappointing. It also left my hair ‚Äúcrunchy‚Äù in certain spots. Overall for the price it wasn‚Äôt worth it. I won‚Äôt be buying this again. The two stars are because the shipping was very fast and the product smelled very nice.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Light conditioner
Review: What I loved most about this conditioner is that after putting it in your hair, it seems to melt into you hair.  Running my hands over my conditioned hair, I couldn't even feel it.  But after rinsing it out, I could feel how soft my hair was

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Smells amazing and works well
Review: Curly-Girl Method- Approved!  Smells great, i use it almost every day (I know, I know....) but it doesnt dry my hair out and cleans well!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: The best one and done product for my 2b/2c curls
Review: I was nervous about using this product because I have tried other custards and they weighed my hair down. This product has exceeded my expectations. It provides enough moisture without weighing my hair down and good hold so that my hair still looks good the second day.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Obviates the need to wash those curls every day
Review: The best part of this fine product is that you can refresh your curly hairstyle for 3-4 days without washing. Those with naturally curly hair will know that this is a true bonus as too much shampooing dries and otherwise has deleterious effects. I will keep buying this FOREVER.There is no fragrance! YAY. It seems to keep the hair moisturized. It can be crunchy or sheer as you like it.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: no foul odor or strong smell
Review: WOW! This works. A tiny bit goes a long way. It is very goopy so handle with car or half of the contents will spill out into your bathroom sink and floor. Not greasy, no foul odor or strong smell. Worth every penny!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I Love It!
Review: MopTop is one of my favorite brands. This custard does a great job at defining curls and limiting frizz. I have dry, 3B hair and I use about a tablespoon of this product each time I have a wash day. It's a bit pricy and the jar is small, so I'm holding off on buying another jar, and I am just using an alcohol-free gel from the grocery store for now. But the next time this goes on sale I'll be buying some more!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Smells lovely
Review: I love this shampoo. I have very straight, fine, thinning hair that is going through changes due to hormones. It doesn't dry out my scalp, has a lovely, light scent that isn't overpowering at all, especially since I don't usually buy scented things due to allergies. It's great for my kids' hair too, although it stings if it gets in their eyes. My friend with thick, lushious hair (on the oily side) mentioned it didn't rinse out of her hair well, but I love the extra moisture.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Lesser known holy grail product
Review: I'm a big fan of this stuff. It's my favorite gel for my 3a(ish) hair. I use it in combination with a curl cream, because my hair is thick and needs a lot of moisture, but this product can be a one-step curl routine for finer hair. I like it better than Deva Curl gel. It has better hold and does some special slip action that is very moisturizing and unique to the product. I also like the way it sculpts my curls a little bit more than the Deva gels. I love the definition I get from this product. Although you use a generous amount, I wouldn't load it on too thick, because it is fairly strong. You need to be kind of sparing when reapplying on second day hair--I would recommend not reapplying to the whole head. My only criticism is that it can create slightly more buildup than other lighter gels, like Deva. The smell is citrusy and lovely. The ingredients are VERY clean. Buy, buy, buy.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Not Great for What I Paid.
Review: This did nothing to enhance my waves. My hair was dry and frizzy after using. I have resorted to using a small dab of my daily conditioner as a leave-in conditioner and I get much better results. Returned this product for a refund.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Great custard
Review: I‚Äôm not a big fan of gels/custards but this product is amazing! It smells good, it‚Äôs not overwhelming/overpowering! my curls are define, not weighed down, and the crunch isn‚Äôt so bad for me but even after crunching it out my hair still looks good! I have wavy/curly hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Great for  curls!
Review: OMG! FINALLY A HAIR PRODUCT MADE FOR MY CURLS (2c/3a). This  product gave me definition without weighing my curls down! It even made my hair shine. It cuts down on frizz and the smell is pleasant without being overwhelming.  You only have to use a little, making a great value!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: MAKES MY HAIR CURL LIKE NEVER BEFORE!!!
Review: This magical stuff has been one of my two favorite products for frizz free summer hair. I start with a generous amount of this, and then top with Jessicurl Spiralicious. By far the best my naturally wavy hair has ever looked! This combo keeps my hair looking great for 2 - 3 days, without refreshing. I'm just sorry that I didn't try this sooner.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Strong scent
Review: I really wanted to like this product, which I purchased with their leave in conditioner. I can‚Äôt speak to the effectiveness of these products because I couldn‚Äôt get past the very strong smells. I‚Äôm not usually super sensitive to smells, but these were so strongly scented that I couldn‚Äôt bear to use them! Many of the places I go are requireing that no scent be used and this would keep me from being able to go to those places. Bummer.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Wanted to like, but no bueno!
Review: I purchased this product after trying the Medium Hold Gel. The product arrived sealed in clear plastic, however, the inner safety disk was partially missing. It seems to have dissolved into the product ‚Äî see the photo. The scent is a very strong citrus smell. It is too strong for my liking and immediately irritated my eyes. Product has an expiration date of 09/21. This is not a keeper and must be returned.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Great for 2b/c Waves!
Review: It works just as described. It enhances my waves without weighing my hair down. It‚Äôs my new favorite!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I absolutely love it. I still have a tiny bit of ...
Review: My hair is soft, less frizzy, and not weighed down too much. I have a lot of thick wavy/curly hair. I think it‚Äôs 2c/3a. Anyway, my problem is frizz. This stuff makes my hair smooth & the curls are more defined, but not hard. I absolutely love it. I still have a tiny bit of frizz but I‚Äôve only been using a small amount. Just FYI I also use Shea Moisture JBCO shampoo, masks in place of conditioner, and leave in JCBO conditioner. So those are to thank as well but still, I could definitely tell a difference after using this. Love love love.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Love it!
Review: I haven‚Äôt found a great product to hold my curls until this one! I just bought a little bit in my head, scrunch it and my curls can hold for 2-3 days. Smells really nice and it‚Äôs not super sticky or goopy in my fingers.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Terrible fragrance, white flakes
Review: The scent is incredibly strong and smells artificial (which is odd for a natural product) - like a sweet citrus toilet cleaner. I found this very flakey once it dried and I scrunched. It also left my loose fine curls very piecey and divided (not clumped and full). Not the right product for me.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Not a winner
Review: I want to love this product, but I'm probably going to return it.Cons:-Flakes. My hair is black, so although the flaking is only in certain places where too much product sat on my hair, it's still embarrassingly visible. I've tried to use less, but then there's no hold.-Expensive compared to other gels.-Arrived with seal broken and lid barely screwed on. Gross & unprofessional.Pros:-Good light hold for my 2c waves. Easy to scrunch out the crunch without creating frizz.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Watery
Review: The bottle I received smelled off and was very runny, like maybe it was too old or a bad batch.  I sent it back and ordered some from another website, which was the correct consistency and smell.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Cleaning but not drying
Review: Very gentle, my hair feels pretty clean when I use it without drying it out.  Trying out this curly girl thing and still in the transition phase.  My hair is fine, dense 2b waves and it is pretty oily.  Could not comprehend the idea of co-washing considering the oil levels in my hair.  I can use this and I feel clean after.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Not worth the hype... crunchy curls
Review: For all the rave reviews I read on this product, I was expecting it to be foolproof. I followed the instructions, applied it to sopping wet hair, and it created nothing but a scraggly, crunchy look. I was really hoping this would work on my hair but it failed to impress.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: This product is life-changing
Review: I have struggled to find a product that doesn‚Äôt weight down my fine curls but gives definition without making my hair crunchy. This is it! It doesn‚Äôt build up either it‚Äôs amazing. I never thought I‚Äôd Gina a replacement for Catwalk Curls Rock Curl Amplifier but this is it and it‚Äôs not sticky like the curl amplifier. I‚Äôm in love with this product.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I've tried everything and this is GREAT
Review: I can honestly say I've tried enough curly hair products to sink a boat. This stuff is fantastic. I have very dry, thick wavy/curly hair, and it gets weighted down and looks unhealthy. This custard leaves my hair soft and gives me defined curls to even the most stubborn strands of hair that just look frizzy. I've been applying it to wet hair, letting it dry for an hour, and then diffuse. I need to add just a tiny bit more after diffusing to tame flyaways, but that's it. I typically laugh at products that claim you need a quarter sized amount - that's such a load of garbage for anyone with longer, thick hair. But this stuff....you do not need a lot to go along way! This custard has replaced 2 other products that I no longer need in my routine. I'm super happy so far!!!!!!!!!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Not what I was looking for

Title: Flaky residue- ugh

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I like gels/custards that leave a light cast
Review: I like gels/custards that leave a light cast. This does not so it doesn't work if used alone for me. That's the only reason why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I need the cast for my hair to hold up for 2nd or 3rd day hair. If it's too soft on 1st day hair, it wont hold up. HOWEVER, this product is still GREAT! It adds great definition to your curls and it is very forgiving if you use too much. If you like soft touch hold with defined curls, then this is for you. I actually combine it with another gel. I first use it on really damp hair as a "primer" and then finish off with the devacurl arc angel ultra hold gel. I don't have to use nearly as much devacurl gel and the combination of both products give me great definition. I will be purchasing it again.

Title: Not quite right for my hair
Review: This stuff smells amazing, but it's just too heavy for my fine 2b/c curls. I have thin, porous hair, and this custard makes it pretty weighed down and icky. Though if I scrunch enough after it seems to look sort of OK.That being said, I think it could work really well for someone with thicker hair and a different curl texture. Instead, I'm just trying to use it up by applying to the bottom layer of my hair and using something else on the top. If you have curls like mine, I highly recommend AG Hair Cosmetics Curl Trigger Defining Spray. It's a little pricy but so great at forming curls without weighing them down.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Caution - PHENOXYETHANOL
Review: I have been searching and searching for a curl cream that doesn't contain any unsafe toxic ingredient. I got excited about this one until I came to "PHENOXYETHANOL". It is commonly used in just about every cosmetics as a replacement for parabens but there are studies linking it to adverse effects. For those of you interested in as less toxicity as possible you may want to consider and Google for the info

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: really nice products for dry hair...
Review: I don't have dry hair or course hair, my hair is baby fine and too soft, so these products are too heavy for my hair.Thankfully, I only bought a sample pack from her website, so I didn't spend $$ on something that I would not use.I recommend the sample for those of you who are not sure about this product for your hair. The shampoo was too moisturizing for my hair and the conditioner was ridiculously too oily for my hair. I had a film of oil on my hair and mybody after I tried rinsing it out, so I had to go back and rewash with my regular shampoo. I do not recommend this forsoft fine hair, but I think it would be great for course dry hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Made my scalp itchy and flakey
Review: I really wanted to like this shampoo because I love this brand, but unfortunately, this product did not work for me. The very first time I washed with this shampoo, I noticed that large sections of my scalp were covered in flaking skin. This was mostly an issue around my crown and forehead area. It was the strangest thing; the flaking would begin immediately after use (noticeable even under wet hair) and continue to get worse for the day or two after washing. After the hair dried, it would begin to itch and continue to get itchier as time passed. I'm not sure if it was just dry flaky skin or if it was actual dandruff, but the amount of whatever it was was astonishing (and gross).I stopped using the shampoo after about a week, and my problems stopped then, but I've used it a couple of times since (when I was desperate and out of other shampoos) and had the same problem. It's super weird but I haven't heard of anyone else having the same issue. Other than that, it smelled good and did a fine job washing my actual hair, but I just wanted to put this out there in case anyone else experiences something similar.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Awesome so far!!
Review: I have been following the curly girl method for 5 months and have been experimenting with different products and different ways to apply them.  I received a sample of this custard and I love it so far! It made my 2C/3A curls even more curly!  I use a denman brush when I wash my hair, then I scrunch this into wet hair on top of homemade flax seed gel.  I only used a nickel sized amount on my thin hair which is just past my shoulders.  My curls were popping like never before!  It does have glycerin but it's winter now so it works great 4 me.  Not sure how well it will work in the humid summer because of the glycerin.I see some reviewers complained about this gel making their hair crunchy but keep in mind you're supposed to scrunch the hardness out of your hair in order to get soft curls.  Other reviewers complained of flaking but this wasn't an issue for me as i used on wet hair and did not mess with my curls after they dried and I "scrunched out the crunch".  Maybe "scrunching out the crunch" with some light oil would help with that?  Anyway, I give this stuff 2 thumbs up!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: really nice product for dry hair...
Review: I don't have dry hair or course hair, my hair is baby fine and too soft, so these products are too heavy for my hair.Thankfully, I only bought a sample pack from her website, so I didn't spend $$ on something that I would not use.I recommend the sample for those of you who are not sure about this product for your hair. The shampoo was too moisturizing for my hair and the conditioner was ridiculously too oily for my hair. I had a film of oil on my hair and mybody after I tried rinsing it out, so I had to go back and rewash with my regular shampoo. I do not recommend this forsoft fine hair, but I think it would be great for course dry hair.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Why the fragrance?
Review: I won't be buying this product or any other hair product with fragrance.  I am extremely chemically sensitive and believe me these hair oils use chemical fragrance.  Why bother with "organic" etc etc if you're going to add a strong chemical for the fragrance?  I don't get it.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: It's alright but better products out there for cheaper
Review: This product smells really nice, like limes.  It feels like that sugar body scrub you use.  I put some on my damp hair.  It will hold some of the curl in, but when it dries it turns hard like glue then starts to flake.  Compared to Ampro gel, which is much cheaper, I like Ampro better.  Ampro will smooth out my hair and make it straighter as it is holding it down.  Plus when it dries, it is not hard as glue, comes out easy and does not damage hair.  Ampro does very little flaking as well.  Back to that,

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: I diluted this....
Review: I have very fine hair, so products will weigh it down easily.  I tried this several times and it was way too heavy for my hair. So, I got the idea of diluting a little with water, so that I could put it in a squeeze bottle and apply to my hair. It works great. My curls look as good with this product as any other curl enhancer that I have used.  I use a few pumps of deva curl ultra defining gel on top.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: PHOTOGRAPHERS are "Fans" of MopTop too!
Review: I had the Great and Unexpected pleasure of meeting the makers of MopTop at the Natural Expo in March in which I was photographing- What a joy! I used the products and they ACTUALLY WORK! I literally saw my course coils and for the first time, loved them! Next time, I will use a mixture of Custard and the Medium Hold Gel for more define twists in my Twist-Out...Everyone says by hair looks Great!I personally like that my hair has retained it's moisture as never before, Wow. The smell of the products are amazing and like you instructed at the Expo, a Dab will do ya! It seemed I was squirting a lot in my hand but looking at the remainder in the bottles, Nope!I would literally do a photo shoot for Mop Top. Ha! There's nothing like being apart of a product that you actual believe in!Again, Thank you for introducing me to the MopTop products to try. As someone who does Not manage my own "natural" coils and frequents "the shop" regularly, you have made a Believer out of me. Thank you for this new "discovery"!!adamsvillephotography@gmail.com

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: IT‚ÄôS GREAT!!!!
Review: I am not one to leave reviews on products! But this one, man oh man! I am glad that I found this product!!!! I‚Äôve always tried curly hair girl approved products , but they always weight down my curls and my hair gets super frizzy even though I diffuse. I don‚Äôt diffuse at all , so it would make me upset that even though I diffuse my hair would still get super frizzy! I would try so many methods and nothing! However, this product , I recently purchased the sample packets off their Instagram page. And I am so happy that I finally found a product that does justice to my hair!!!! Thank you, thank you! I wish I could have found this product a little sooner! I will soon be purchasing the regular size custard .

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: not for soft texture
Review: I know many people love this product so I bought it to see how it goes. Turns out it wasn‚Äôt for me. I like no-crunch custard and this leaves my hair dry, frizzy and crunchy.  And if I put it in my hair a little too much, it leaves some white flakes. I live in East Asia so maybe the climate can be one of the reason why it‚Äôs not doing the work? Anyhow I would recommend this for someone who likes crunchy strong hold gel, but I wouldn‚Äôt personally buy it again.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Meh
Review: Im not sure how I feel about this product. I‚Äôve used it twice so far and am just not impressed. It works okay... but it doesn‚Äôt have as much slip as I hoped so it‚Äôs hard to finger detangle my hair. It does clean my hair but I feel it is stripping away some moisture. When I compare it to the other Co-wash I own, which is the AS I AM Coconut cowash, it doesn‚Äôt perform as well.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: This conditioner is pretty good. It glides through my curly hair nicely
Review: This conditioner is pretty good. It glides through my curly hair nicely, and helps keep the curl controlled as my hair dries.  Does not make my hair frizzy.  It smells nice, sweet like some kind of candy.  The reason for 2 stars is the bottle it comes in.  The product itself is pretty thick, like pudding.  It does not flow.  The plastic bottle it's in is thick hard plastic. It's ridiculously difficult to squeeze a thick, pudding-like product out of a narrow-necked stiff plastic bottle.  If you take the cap off you can "shake" it out, which is what I do, but it's not ideal considering that sometimes it shakes out a huge glob bigger than you need, which is a hassle again to scrape the excess back in.  The directions for use on the bottle state in bold letters, "shake well".  Lol, how do you shake this product well, especially when the bottle is brand new and filled to the top, and for what purpose?  Does the product separate as it sits it something.  No.  I just think there must be a lot of people in the company who don't understand the product or use it themselves.  The product would be better contained in a jar with a lid that you can dip your fingers into, or maybe a soft squeezable tube that can be stored upside down.  I wouldn't buy it again.  It doesn't seem like the manufacturer understands its own product. It's not exactly a bargain price either.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Years of use
Review: Awesome conditioner...so happy Amazon carries this now so I can get it wherever I travel.  I've used this product for years.  This is a wonderful company who cares about their customers.  For the person who thinks moptop is derogatory...I bet it's more of a referral to Shirley Temple...that was her nickname.  I love this product...only stuff I use...I dread the day I run out...now I won't.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Awesome hold, Awesome curl definition, Awesome moisture!
Review: Awesome, Awesome, Awesome!!! I have thick, dense naturally wavy/spiral curls & this product has changed my entire haircare routine. My very first wash n go without frizz & needing to stretch my curls. I finished with the Mop Top Mongongo Oil. Both products will actually save me money since I don't have to put together a cocktail for proper curl definition, hold with moisture. I rarely write reviews. This one was a must. Follow the directions on the product labels & you'll be impressed.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: New holy grail
Review: I'm in love with this conditioner. I have fine 2b curls and this conditioner provides the perfect amount of moisture without weighing my hair down. I also the the smell.

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Best curl product yet!
Review: Absolutely love this hair product, I have been through everything and then some for my crazy curly hair! Definitely recommend!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: For the wavy-hair girls
Review: I understand that this seems to work for girls with more defined curly hair. However, for my thick, frizzy 2B hair, this custard totally weighed down my hair. It didn't even work like a gel ‚Äî no definition, no crunch. My hair was flatter than ever. However, it was very moisturizing and totally got rid of frizz. Can't use it personally, however!

Product: ÔªøMopTop Gentle Shampoo, Natural Hair Moisturizer, Reduces Frizz, Color Safe Volumizing Shampoo - For All Hair Types, Straight, Curly, Wavy, Thin, Coily (8 oz)
Title: Surprising Good!
Review: I bought these products after winning the travel sized kit and loving the daily conditioner.  I like the gentle shampoo because it cleaned my hair without stripping all the natural oils.  The deep conditioner didn't give me the same kind of slip for detangling as the the daily conditioner, but it did what it said it would do.  The leave it in conditioner gave my hair a light hold like a gel without the crunchy hardness of a gel.  It also left my hair soft and smooth.  I will for sure buy the leave it in conditioner and the gentle shampoo again.  I gave this review a 4 not 5 stars because the deep conditioner doesn't have the same slip as the daily conditioner.  The daily conditioner is the best conditioner for slip I have every used.  If you have frizzy curly hair these products are awesome.  It costs more, but these products are very high in and they work.  I have kinky curly hair and I love these products.  BTW it your hair is protein sensitive don't use the deep conditioner more then once a week.

Title: Verified Purchase
Review: I really love this product. I heard about on from CurlyPenny on YouTube and she swears by this stuff. I was hoping for a MIRACLE product that would really make all my curls extra defined and absolutely no frizz, but it's not working perfectly on my hair type. My hair is suuuuper thick, coarse, and I have a lot of it. It's curly/wavy but I know some little curls are hidden in there! The best method I found for me was to bring it with me in the shower, and after I rinse my conditioner out with cold water, I put a generous amount of this in my hair with my head upside down with a crunching motion. Try it! All in all I do love it and I may buy it again once I run out, unless I find something even better!

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: Licensed Cosmetologist
Review: Is this a bad product, no.Was it right for me?, no!Here's some facts, wavy  and curly hair have 3 layers, which is what gives it that wave and/or curl which also means typically requires more moisture to penetrate that 3rd layer. Unless hair is extremely fine.This has lemon sage so I should have read that but I was drawn to the cute moptop name. Lemon sage is invigorating and cleansing. So great for oily hair or fine hair. It gave a little moisture but honestly not enough for me. I recommend if you have fine hair.I do not recommend  if you have wavy, curly, dry, course, colored (especially bleach) or grey hair. Its not a bad product  but it was really wrong for me and I had to rewash my hair with a deep moisture conditioner after using it.

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: Amazing definition and hold with softness!
Review: Product is authentic directly from Moptop which i love! This is my holy grail, never-fail wavy curly gel perfect for literally ALL climates. It leaves a light cast that easily scrunches out and leaves frizz free defined voluminous wavy curly hair! I will never go without this stuff!

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: Need much sturdier tape on lids- bottle open/spilled on receipt
Review: Conditioner smells great. Has great texture. Unfortunately, I was introduced to both of these facts upon opening the box, because the silver and red ‚Äútamper-proof‚Äù sticker had indeed been tampered with; It was torn in half, and the lid unscrewed, and a healthy gob conditioner squeezed into the box and over the bottle.Yes, what remains is useable, and it is *most* of the bottle. But at this price point? It‚Äôs far too expensive for receiving a partial bottle to be acceptable.Strongly suggest whomever is tasked with shipping procedures throw the stickers in the junk and purchase a sturdy strapping tape...it‚Äôs probably cheaper that the stickers to boot.

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: The Product is Advertised Incorrectly!
Review: BEWARE!! I did not receive the product I ordered!  I ordered 8 oz ANTI FRIZZ MEDIUM HOLD GEL!  I received 6oz MEDIUM HOLD GEL!  They are two completely different products.  The one I received IS NOT the ANTI FRIZZ!!The 1st picture is what is advertised. The 2nd photo is what I received. There is a huge difference in the products.  Not just the label!  There is a medium hold gel and there is an anti frizz medium hold gel.  I ordered the anti frizz!

Title: This gel has potential
Review: this gel does smell good and I do like the hold it provides.  There is no flaking and once it is dry it is very soft.  My big complaint is that it is so thick it takes FOREVER to dry.  I don't know if its just my hair - but it just clumps on and takes FOREVER to dry.  I have to wait until the next day to have hair that doesn't look wet.Once the bottle was 2/3 empty I added water - about 50/50 - and it is much better.  My hair actually looks dry the same day.I am still on the fence if I am going to purchase this again

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: Smells Great, Works Well So Far
Review: I love the smell of this product! It almost reminds me of Fruit Loops or some kind of Lemon cookie.. I always look forward to lathering it in my hair and relaxing to the smell of it, I only wish the great smell lingered longer after it dried (although I don't use it daily).While it's nourishing, I find that I have to use a lot more than the recommended amount in order to really saturate my hair and condition, otherwise my curls don't stay nice and tight like I like them to. So far, the best way that I've found to use it (for me, anyway) is to saturate my hair with the product in the shower and I won't even rinse it out. It does take longer to dry (I let my hair air dry), but it's worth it to not have to style my hair afterwards with a different product.This is my first use of a curly-girl-recommended product and so far I'm happy with the results :)

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: Frizz city
Review: This is the second time I tried Mop-Top. I have about 3b/c hair and this never does anything for frizz or creating defined curls. I finger curl with kinky-curly and Aussie freeze, they never cause frizz. This stuff made my hair a puff ball with no definition and woof. Even if it was $5, I wouldn‚Äôt buy it again.

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: and I love it! I'm so happy to find it on ...
Review: I've been using MopTop for a while now, and I love it! I'm so happy to find it on Amazon instead of having to go to Whole Foods to get it. MopTop is gentle but gets the sweat and excess oil out of my hair from my daily workouts in hot, humid weather. I have long, fine, wavy/curly hair, and it looks great thanks to MopTop's line. For years, the back of my head used to itch after exercise, and I thought it was normal and caused by the salt in sweat. After using MopTop for a week or two, my head stopped itching. And my scalp doesn't get dry and flakey in the winter anymore. My daughter also uses the shampoo and Daily Conditioner on her long, straight, color-treated hair and loves it, which surprised me because she's a super picky brand snob who has zero interest in natural products. (With the shampoo, you can kind of tell it's a natural product because sometimes one of the ingredients settles in the bottom of the bottle. It's all the same color, but the bottom looks thicker or a different consistency. I stored the bottle upside down for a day to even it out again.) Anyway, this shampoo is the perfect mix of gentle but effective.After seeing noticeably better scalp and hair health with the shampoo and conditioner, I started using several products in the line, including the Curly Hair Custard, Leave In Conditioner, Hair Gel, Mongongo Oil and Clarifying Shampoo. I mix MopTop products with another brand of hair thickening cream (MopTop doesn't have one or I'd use it), and pick my hair cocktail depending on the day's weather. I always start with MopTop shampoo and conditioner, and I always get compliments on my hair! You definitely can't go wrong with this shampoo!

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair
Title: The BEST conditioner on the planet
Review: For anyone with curly, frizzy, wavy hair....this is the best product on the planet. I have searched for years (and I'm talking at least 30 years) for something that would work. It's not heavy, not greasy, and the best part was a trick I learned...it's truly ok to leave it in after you shampoo. That made all the difference in the world. I honestly get compliments every single day. Love the conditioner...but love the shampoo and the custard as well.

Product: 12oz, MopTop Salon Gentle Shampoo, Sulfate & Paraben Free, Color Safe, Natural, for All Hair Types, made w/Aloe & Honey that reduces Frizz, increases Moisture & Manageability for Smooth, Silky Hair

The trick is to apply the gel while my hair is sipping wet.

I love this! I have long hair to my lower back and a mixture of 3a/3b curls. I found my perfect hair combo and will always repurchase these products. Love, love, LOVE! I only use about a quarter size on each side of my hair (keep in mind its long) and I apply it by scrunching it in and it works like a charm. I don't need much, thanks to curls in a bottle. This gel does leave a lil bit of crunch, but when its all dry (I air dry) just scrunch it out and you'll have soft shiny curls ;-)

I used a DevaCurl styler and the Kinky Curl Knot Today Leave-In and had flaking (a lot) after it dried.  I'm not willing to give up my leave in, so I have a $20 bottle of gel that I do not foresee using.  I have started using the Kinky Curly Curling Custard and it does not flake, has great hold and does not dry my hair.

I apply it after the Shea moisture curl enhancing smoothie, and also use a tiny bit to refresh the next day. It creates a cast, which I break after my hair becomes completely dry. It leaves my hair moisturized, and doesn‚Äôt weigh it down (which is very easy to do with 2a/2b waves). Having used this product for the last 6 months, I would highly recommend it.

Title: Licensed Cosmetologist
Review: Is this a bad product, no.Was it right for me?, no!Here's some facts, wavy  and curly hair have 3 layers, which is what gives it that wave and/or curl which also means typically requires more moisture to penetrate that 3rd layer. Unless hair is extremely fine.This has lemon sage so I should have read that but I was drawn to the cute moptop name. Lemon sage is invigorating and cleansing. So great for oily hair or fine hair. It gave a little moisture but honestly not enough for me. I recommend if you have fine hair.I do not recommend  if you have wavy, curly, dry, course, colored (especially bleach) or grey hair. Its not a bad product  but it was really wrong for me and I had to rewash my hair with a deep moisture conditioner after using it.

Title: Smells Great, Works Well So Far
Review: I love the smell of this product! It almost reminds me of Fruit Loops or some kind of Lemon cookie.. I always look forward to lathering it in my hair and relaxing to the smell of it, I only wish the great smell lingered longer after it dried (although I don't use it daily).While it's nourishing, I find that I have to use a lot more than the recommended amount in order to really saturate my hair and condition, otherwise my curls don't stay nice and tight like I like them to. So far, the best way that I've found to use it (for me, anyway) is to saturate my hair with the product in the shower and I won't even rinse it out. It does take longer to dry (I let my hair air dry), but it's worth it to not have to style my hair afterwards with a different product.This is my first use of a curly-girl-recommended product and so far I'm happy with the results :)

Title: and I love it! I'm so happy to find it on ...
Review: I've been using MopTop for a while now, and I love it! I'm so happy to find it on Amazon instead of having to go to Whole Foods to get it. MopTop is gentle but gets the sweat and excess oil out of my hair from my daily workouts in hot, humid weather. I have long, fine, wavy/curly hair, and it looks great thanks to MopTop's line. For years, the back of my head used to itch after exercise, and I thought it was normal and caused by the salt in sweat. After using MopTop for a week or two, my head stopped itching. And my scalp doesn't get dry and flakey in the winter anymore. My daughter also uses the shampoo and Daily Conditioner on her long, straight, color-treated hair and loves it, which surprised me because she's a super picky brand snob who has zero interest in natural products. (With the shampoo, you can kind of tell it's a natural product because sometimes one of the ingredients settles in the bottom of the bottle. It's all the same color, but the bottom looks thicker or a different consistency. I stored the bottle upside down for a day to even it out again.) Anyway, this shampoo is the perfect mix of gentle but effective.After seeing noticeably better scalp and hair health with the shampoo and conditioner, I started using several products in the line, including the Curly Hair Custard, Leave In Conditioner, Hair Gel, Mongongo Oil and Clarifying Shampoo. I mix MopTop products with another brand of hair thickening cream (MopTop doesn't have one or I'd use it), and pick my hair cocktail depending on the day's weather. I always start with MopTop shampoo and conditioner, and I always get compliments on my hair! You definitely can't go wrong with this shampoo!

I love this! I have long hair to my lower back and a mixture of 3a/3b curls. I found my perfect hair combo and will always repurchase these products. Love, love, LOVE! I only use about a quarter size on each side of my hair (keep in mind its long) and I apply it by scrunching it in and it works like a charm. I don't need much, thanks to curls in a bottle. This gel does leave a lil bit of crunch, but when its all dry (I air dry) just scrunch it out and you'll have soft shiny curls ;-)

I'm not willing to give up my leave in, so I have a $20 bottle of gel that I do not foresee using.  I have started using the Kinky Curly Curling Custard and it does not flake, has great hold and does not dry my hair.

Review: Phil's girlfriend here. I've used several hair gels in the past as part of the curly girl method, and this is by far my favorite. The gel itself has a nice citrus smell which doesn‚Äôt stay on my hair after I've applied it (too bad!). The gel is very comfortable to use. I apply it after the Shea moisture curl enhancing smoothie, and also use a tiny bit to refresh the next day. It creates a cast, which I break after my hair becomes completely dry. It leaves my hair moisturized, and doesn‚Äôt weigh it down (which is very easy to do with 2a/2b waves). Having used this product for the last 6 months, I would highly recommend it.
